title: WTF happened to the boards?
body:
Lmao, 3/4 of the "hot" page is from a week or more ago, I used to come here to check things out and there was plenty of new stuff to see daily. 
What happened? Dead game suddenly or what?

replies.body: There's a bot/group downvoting everything, the people who would like to do something about it (volunteer mod team) don't have the tools for it, the people who have the ability to do something about it (Riot) don't care about Boards. And the new top nav bar was pushed to all Riot sites without consideration for how people actually might use those sites, so mods can't even notify people about removed/edited posts. Most mods have decided to ignore all but the most egregious reports now. Basically, this place is dead.
Hi daddy, are you the one down voting everything here?
I cant even find the place where it shows me to replied to my comments
Wtf is the point of the boards if you cant see notifications..

well with the new ''reworked'' forums they don't exactly encourage people to post on here anymore since you can't even see notifications about replies anymore so it's impossible to know if someone replied to you or quoted you, it's so dumb.
Dead game really isn't at all close. Reddit league communities are decent, and the game is popular, its just a lack of awareness or care directed at the boards, so more accurately dead boards
Some kid down voting everything. I suggest Reddit for actual community opinions and threads

1. Reworked forum is at level of WC3: Reforged.
2. Riot is not smart enough to remove downvote system.

Bots downvoting everything new, notifications are down (you have to insert the website for notifications or find and click a link in another__ thread) moderator aren’t  moderating, they’ve admitted to not moderating, they also said the bot doesn’t exist etc etc.
Someone has got the hots for you and is downvoting everything you say lmfao

I don’t really care, only kids and people with no self esteem care about votes at this point.
Hot board should be by replies/comments on the post not how many upvotes something has.
My self esteem has evaporated ever since I got my first mass downvotes. I feel like I'm a new mofo who does not give a shit about votes anymore

I wonder if my sentence is correct here.
